title: Intrinsic effects of electrolytes on lithium metal deposition and dissolution investigated through a separator-free cell

Lithium metal batteries are a significant promise for next-generation energy storage due to their high energy density. However, challenges persist in their commercialization stemming from issues during the lithium deposition/dissolution...
